The URL for this stylesheet is built by inserting ‘-rtl’ into the URL of the left-to-right stylesheet. Normally, ‘-rtl’ is inserted before the ‘.css’ extension. trans-unit.source: Generic, multiple row results can be pulled from the database with get_results. The method returns the entire query result as an array. Each element of this array corresponds to one row of the query result and, like get_row, can be an object, an associative array, or a numbered array. If no matching rows are found, or if there is a database error, the return value will be an empty array. If your $query string is empty, or you pass an invalid $output_type, NULL will be returned.
trans-unit.target: Generic, multiple row results can be pulled from the database with get_results . The method returns the entire query result as an array. Each element of this array corresponds to one row of the query result and, like get_row , can be an object, an associative array, or a numbered array. If no matching rows are found, or if there is a database error, the return value will be an empty array. If your $query string is empty, or you pass an invalid $output_type , NULL will be returned.
